text: Alex 'Barney' McLure was an Australian rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s. ==Playing career== McLure featured only in the 1942 NSWRFL season for the St. George club. McLure was a noted Sydney domestic rugby union player that played for Gordon RFC that switched to Rugby League during the war years. Whiticker/Hudson "The Encyclopedia of Rugby League Players" 1955 () ==Death== McLure died on 15 March 2005 at Kingsgrove, New South Wales, age 88. title: Barney McLure
